item.title: Jon add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Hell is empty and all the devils are here." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Jon add a quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein
item.description: "Hell isn't other people. Hell is yourself." -- Ludwig Wittgenstein

item.title: Jon add a quote by Allie Brosh
item.description: "Most people can motivate themselves to do things simply by knowing that those things need to be done. But not me. For me, motivation is this horrible, scary game where I try to make myself do something while I actively avoid doing it. If I win, I have to do something I don't want to do. And if I lose, I'm one step closer to ruining my entire life. And I never know whether I'm going to win or lose until the last second." -- Allie Brosh

item.title: Jon add a quote by Allie Brosh
item.description: "Procrastination has become its own solution - a tool I can use to push myself so close to disaster that I become terrified and flee toward success. A more troubling matter is the day-to-day activities that don't have massive consequences when I neglect to do them." -- Allie Brosh

item.title: Jon add a quote by Allie Brosh
item.description: "For me, motivation is this horrible, scary game where I try to make myself do something while I actively avoid doing it." -- Allie Brosh

item.title: Jon add a quote by Gideon Defoe
item.description: "Don't listen to people telling you that getting up early is best. RenÃ© Descartes is one of history's most important philosophers, but he rarely got out of bed before noon - and when he started getting up early for a new job as a private tutor, it caused him to catch pneumonia and die." -- Gideon Defoe

item.title: Jon add a quote by Joseph Campbell
item.description: "Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life. It is a waste to be asking the question when you are the answer." -- Joseph Campbell

item.title: Jon add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Jon add a quote by Shirley Jackson
item.description: "No live organism can continue for long to exist sanely under conditions of absolute reality." -- Shirley Jackson
